answers.author: Amanda Dodge
answers.text:
Hi Lee,
If you are documenting for ICMA’s Credentialing Program, you can track at http://icma.org/credentialing after you are credentialed. The credentialing advisory board looks for a specific example of something learned from each professional development activity (as opposed to agendas and registration forms or just a list of what was attended). You can find a sample annual report as well as many other helpful resources at http://icma.org/en/icma/members/credentialing/credentialing_resources . Also, the FAQs sheet on that same page provides a great explanation of why the credentialing advisory board asks program participants to tell what they learned.
I hope this helps,
Amanda Dodge
International City/County Management Association
Knowledge Network Intern
202-962-3699
adodge@icma.org
